org.hibernate.ejb.criteria

Class ValueHandlerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.ejb.criteria.ValueHandlerFactory

  • public class ValueHandlerFactory
extends Object
    Helper for generically dealing with literal values.
